name: Space Rocks (itch) (Phoosh Maroon)
description:
Playing around with my space flight and atmosphere.  Currently just a mouse steer, W/S speed up/slow down, A/D strafe, Q/E to make yourself dizzy, Space for Up, Ctrl for Down, Escape to end your experience.

There are a whole pile of unoptimized asteroids that may cause lag on many systems - I've done no work on LODs yet. No AI just yet (but soon, because who doesn't like being shot at?). And you don't have weapons because you've been bad.

Note, this is not yet a game, unless you just like flying around and trying not to run into things. This is just what I'll be obsessing over for the next little bit until I'm actually happy with it. Then more will come.
